data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_c4bb270c28c7be663f57e993b0d6d3d8.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Terizla gains 1% extra Damage Reduction (up to 20 (+1*Hero Level)%) for every 2.5% HP lost.
He cannot gain extra Attack Speed and will convert every 1% extra Attack Speed he's supposed to receive into 1 extra Physical Attack.

Terizla cracks the ground with his hammer and the fissure will spread out, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. After the fissure hits the first target, it will drill into the target and slow them by 15%. At the same time, Terizla's Movement Speed will be increased by 15% for 3.5s. The fissure on target will then explode, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 20% of the enemy's lost HP <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

Terizla swings his hammer in a fan-shaped area ahead. This skill can be cast up to 3 times. The first two attacks deal 90<font color="fba51f"> (+135% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> each, while the third deals 225<font color="fba51f"> (+220% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Enemies hit will also be slowed by 20% for 1.25s (the Slowing Effect can stack).
Deals only 70% damage to Minions.

Terizla jumps to the designated area, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s. He then summons Scaffold and slows enemies by 25%. Scaffold will send out a hook at enemy heroes in range and pull them several times while dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> each time.

data.name: Terizla

__data.skilldesc: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Lifesteal and Defense for great sustain.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: TS - Kidbomba
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Once an eccentric master smith, but now an avenger siding with the Abyss.

assist.desc: Terizla works best with heroes who have strong initiation skills that allow him to deal more damage with his skills, heroes like Gatotkaca and Atlas are good examples here.

strong.desc: Terizla is strong against light melee fighters cause they'll have a hard time surviving his heavy skill damage, such as Zilong and Sun.

weak.desc: Terizla is countered by heroes with good Mobility or long attack range, because it will be diffcult to hit them with his skills. Such as Arlott and Lesley.
